title: Permanently Banned
body:

Looking at my "This is what you said to get banned" thing. I think the ban was completely unnecessary. I'll post what was said, and for me to get banned because of this? Seems a little odd. And its only 1 games logs that are reported. I was in the reform period and only 1 bad game which i flamed that caused the ban?   Also linked the print screen of the box. It was only 1 game reported and that triggered a ban.

replies.body:
Found it!

> Luxium: %%%got

While the rest of your chat log is moderately toxic and negative (threatening to afk at lvl 1, generally being a jerk), hate speech is a definite no-no. Any instance of hate speech usually escalates the punishment up, occasionally resulting in a permaban in the first instance. 

If you want to appeal your case, go through[ Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Although, it's unlikely they will change the status of your ban from what is written in this log.

You mentioned the "reform period", have you ever been chat restricted or temp banned before?
You raged in urf? That is the saddest part of the whole thread.

I get what you're saying, and the "may as well afk, cant do anything, cyas at 15", is probably not what triggered the people to report you, but it is worth noting that this kind of negativity (while not as immediately obvious) is still a borderline [reportable behavior](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) as it does negatively impact the overall mood of the game.

I love all these posts because they are unironic. I'll give a template.

Title: states ban

Introduction:
I recently got banned, here are the chatlogs:

INSERT EXTREMELY TOXIC GAMELOGS

Conclusion:
Was that really that toxic?

Poll:
Everyone votes yes
So wait, you were already in a "reform period", does that mean you were previously temp banned?
I was but not for toxicity.

Any behaviour that would have gotten you a previous ban that wasn't an instant perma would have put you on thin ice for behaviour punishments. Except perhaps boosting, but I would find it hard to believe that you haven't seen some sort of behaviour punishment in the past with this kind of log.
That kind of negative and abuse language will not be tolerated. He is 100% Ban worthy.
so basically another instance of someone that should've just been either perm or x amount of time muted for using a bad word.

This is what I call toxic.
What I said was not toxic in comparison to you.

Yeah like that other person said it was probably using that "homophobic slur". Its clearly not being used as an attack on gays but that's the way Riot and a lot of people see it. Even if it isn't being used against gays its still homophobic to them which is instantaneous perma.
Should be banned every time for this sort of nonsense
Yes and no, if you have been chat ban before then yes. At the same time it's bad but not so bad to get a perma ban. I'm guessing there is more to it more past games or a history.
